markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Spider Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3206)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An abundance of food, the sudden hatching of a clutch of eggs, or magical influence can cause smaller spiders to gather in terrifying, deadly masses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Spider_Swarm.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Spider Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3206)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=707" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 320 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +4; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), web sense

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Web Sense** The spider swarm has [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 12

</row>

**Immunities**
[grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77), precision, [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=78)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 2, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the spider swarm's space takes 1d4 piercing damage with a DC 14 basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save is exposed to spider swarm venom.

**Spider Swarm Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-474" />
name: Spider Swarm
